title: I would like several range indicators to be added
body:
First, I want a range indicator for both ancient coin and relic shield. It is a little inconvenient when I'm stealthed as Teemo in a lane, and I have no idea if I'm in the right spot to get gold from CS both at the tower and in the middle of the lane.

I don't remember the others. Brb.

replies.body: I would like you to stop playing teemo support

> [{quoted}](name=BellumOmnium,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=FN50V6Ko,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2014-12-24T22:23:25.806+0000)
>
> I would like you to stop playing teemo support

I don't Teemo support. I AFK in mid with gold coin. 
Kappa.
I also want a gold counter for the jungle knives. I want to know when I can sell it and get more money than I spent out of it.

> [{quoted}](name=Inquizelus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=FN50V6Ko,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2014-12-24T21:54:18.907+0000)
>
> I also want a gold counter for the jungle knives. I want to know when I can sell it and get more money than I spent out of it.

Why would you ever sell your Jungle item? You can't take advantage of the new Smites or the enchantments being SUPER gold efficient at all.
